params._capital: The capital to allocate to this strategy.
params._fee: The fee paid to keeper to compensate the gas cost.
The fee paid to keeper to compensate the gas cost
params._minReserveOut: Minimum reserve asset to get during strategy finalization
params._tokenURI: URL with the JSON for the strategy

params._isDeposit: Whether is a deposit or withdraw

params._maxAllocationPercentage: Max allocation percentage of garden capital
params._maxCapitalRequested: Max Capital requested denominated in the reserve asset (0 to be unlimited)
params._maxGasFeePercentage: Max gas fee percentage of garden capital
params._maxTradeSlippagePercentage: Max slippage allowed per trade in % of capital
params._stake: Stake with garden participations absolute amounts 1e18

params._target: Address of the smart contract to call
params._value: Quantity of Ether to provide the call (typically 0)

params._fee: The fee paid to keeper to compensate the gas cost
params._voters: An array of garden member who voted on strategy.
params._votes: An array of votes by on strategy by garden members.

params._opEncodedData: Bytes with the params for the op in the same position in the opTypes array
params._opIntegrations: Addresses with the integration for each op
params._opTypes: An array with the op types

params._token: Address of the token to sweep

params._amountToUnwind: The amount of capital to unwind
params._strategyNAV: NAV of the strategy to unwind.

deleteCandidateStrategy().notice: Delete a candidate strategy by the strategist

executeStrategy(uint256,uint256).notice: Executes an strategy that has been activated and gone through the cooldown period.

expireStrategy(uint256).notice: Expires a candidate that has spent more than CANDIDATE_PERIOD without reaching quorum

finalizeStrategy(uint256,string,uint256).notice: Exits from an executed strategy. Returns balance back to the garden and sets the capital aside for withdrawals in ETH. Pays the keeper. Updates the reserve asset position accordingly.

getNAV().notice: Gets the NAV of assets under management. It is the sum of the NAV of all the operations

getOperationByIndex(uint8).notice: Get the operation params by index

getOperationsCount().notice: Returns the number of operations in this strategy

getStrategyDetails().notice: Get the non-state related details of a Strategy

getStrategyRewardsContext().notice: Get mining context details of a Strategy

getStrategyState().notice: Get the state of a Strategy

getUserVotes(address).notice: Gets the votes casted by the contributor in this strategy

handleWeth(bool,uint256).notice: Deposits or withdraws weth from an operation in this context

initialize(address,address,address,uint2.notice: Initializes the strategy for a garden

invokeApprove(address,address,uint256).notice: Helper to invoke Approve on ERC20 from integrations in the strategy context

invokeFromIntegration(address,uint256,by.notice: Helper to invoke a call to an external contract from integrations in the strategy context

isStrategyActive().notice: Returns whether this strategy is currently active or not

setData(uint8[],address[],bytes).notice: Sets the data for the operations of this strategy

sweep(address,uint256).notice: Any tokens (other than the target) that are sent here by mistake are recoverable by contributors Converts it to the reserve asset and sends it to the garden.

trade(address,uint256,address,uint256).notice: Function that calculates the price using the oracle and executes a trade. Must call the exchange to get the price and pass minReceiveQuantity accordingly.

unwindStrategy(uint256,uint256).notice: Partially unwinds an strategy. Triggered from an immediate withdraw in the Garden.

updateParams(uint256[5]).notice: Allows strategist to update some strategy params
